class.name: com.avnet.alapps.model.gsfc.UserContact
class.comment: A User associated with a Contact assigned a given Contact Type.

column.name: CONTACT_ID
column.comment: A unique Identifier of a Contact.

column.name: CONTACT_TYPE_ID
column.comment: A unique Identifier of a Contact Type.

column.name: USER_ID
column.comment: A unique Identifier of a User.

column.name: CREATE_DT
column.comment: The Date and Time that a row of information within this table was initially Created.

column.name: CREATE_USER_ID
column.comment: An Identifier of the User responsible for Creating a row of information within this table.

column.name: UPDATE_DT
column.comment: The Date and Time that a row of information within this table was initially Created or Last Updated.

column.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: An Identifier of the User responsible for Creating or Last Updating a row of information within this table.
